name: Beef Me Alone!
description:
Beef Me Alone!

Protect Gordy Walker (the famously drunk actor) from fans & paparazzi, while he's on a craving for burgers, tacos and hotdogs. Shove fans out of the way and block photos, so the boulevard media doesn't go crazy on the guy!

Famous and drunk people also deserve to be alone sometimes - also, it's your job.

CONTROLLER RECOMMENDED

CONTAINS FLASHES AND MINOR GLITCHY BUGS

DOWNLOAD WINDOWS VERSION FOR HIGH QUALITY LAGLESS EXPERIENCE
__________________

Made in 7 days for Brackeys Gamejam 2022.2

Concept by Jannis Steffen & Michael Hofsaess

Coding & SFX by Michael Hofsaess

Artwork & 3D by Jannis Steffen

Music by A Boy With A Balloon
